title: What do you want to hear about on Low Elo 87?
body:
We're only hours away from the recording of Low Elo episode 87.

Last week we talked about the new Team Fight spectator mode, Riot's rediscovered sense of humor, swords and visual updates.

What would you like us to talk about this week?

Check out the show on...
iTunes: http://bit.ly/18x7kcX
the Web: http://www.lowelo.com

replies.body:
Been watching worlds like crazy. Thought I'd provide a few topics.

1. The Return of Forgotten Punches : Vi's Glorious Professional Comeback

2. OMG OMG OMG : The Power of Early Dives and Experience Denial to Solo Laners

3. Consider Yourself Spanked : Trinity Force and Why It's so Damn Good on Corki

4. Baby Come Back! : Zac's Blobs and Why He's Fallen Slightly Out of Favor
You know I'm a big fan of punching...
And the punching has been soooooo good.
All sorts of things about the Group Stage of Worlds, OPness section maybe on Faker or SKT1 in general, but yeah i can't think of anything beyond Worlds :P
SKT1's advantage is clearly in their amazing hair. Just... look... at... it...
Ha no wonder those promo vids for their region finals were so good :D

Agreeing with stretch on the resurgence of competitive Vi, she is a personal favorite of mine, but I would like to hear your insight on the reason the Trinity Force ADCs are so strong right now but not seeing the trinity force using top laners at all.
I also am interested in the fact that of the three items that build into triforce, phage is the only one that builds into to no other items.

Discuss how so many of these promo videos are similar to the mineski vs gambit one. "They are our heroes, we'll probably lose, but we'll try". How are these teams top 14 in the world yet are so certain that they have zero chance?

Also, does C9 actually stand a chance or are we in for a huge let down if they draw OMG or SKT1? (assuming TSM doesn't get it together and upset SK)
